bibl.title: Greek Imperial Coins and Roman Propaganda: Some Issues from the Sole Reign of Caracalla. Part 2.
bibl.note: Part 1: San, Vol. 16, No. 3 (Fall 1985) pp. 45-50, ill. - Part 2 examines additional coin issues (including an appendix on the bronze drachms of Alexandria). - Non vidimus. Cf. NL 116 (1986) p. 42, No. 272.

bibl.title: San. Journal of the Society for Ancient Numismatics

bibl.seg: Lorber Catharine C., Greek Imperial Coins and Roman Propaganda: Some Issues from the Sole Reign of Caracalla. Part 2.
San. Journal of the Society for Ancient Numismatics 16, No. 4 (May 1986) pp. 71-76, ill.

Part 1: San, Vol. 16, No. 3 (Fall 1985) pp. 45-50, ill. - Part 2 examines additional coin issues (including an appendix on the bronze drachms of Alexandria). - Non vidimus. Cf. NL 116 (1986) p. 42, No. 272.
